text: Ànábì wọn tún sọ fún wọn pé: "Dájúdájú àmì ìjọba rẹ̀ ni pé, àpótí yóò wá ba yín. N̄ǹkan ìfàyàbalẹ̀ láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa yín àti ohun t’ó ṣẹ́kù nínú ohun tí àwọn ènìyàn (Ànábì) Mūsā àti ènìyàn (Ànábì) Hārūn fi sílẹ̀ ń bẹ nínú àpótí náà. Àwọn mọlāika máa rù ú wá (ba yín). Dájúdájú àmì wà nínú ìyẹn fun yín, tí ẹ bá jẹ́ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo
